text: Like any other website, ZCONNECT.tech uses 'cookies'.
We use the information we collect in various ways, including to: Provide, operate, and maintain our website Improve, personalize, and expand our website

They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs.
Third-party ad servers or ad networks uses technologies like cookies, JavaScript, or Web Beacons that are used in their respective advertisements and links that appear on ZCONNECT.tech, which are sent directly to users' browser.
